post:
Guidelines for this thread:

**General Requests**

* Be respectful
* Provide as much info as possible when making a request or at least as much as is important to you.
* Please only make requests if you are actually looking or would consider buying if the right plan came along.
* You can suggest your own price if you want but understand you may get higher prices.
* You are welcome to provide feedback on offers you see even if you did not make the request. 
* Everyone is encouraged to tag hosts that you think may be a good fit for a request even if you did not make the request yourself.

**Providers**

* Only those with provider tags (service/hosting) may provide prices.
* You do not have to provide an order link. 
* Do not post general offers here that do not fit a request.
* Do not post offers in response to a request that is over 72 hours old.
* If you respond to a request understand that others may also be interested so if it is time-limited please say so to avoid confusion if someone finds it months later.

Any questions or general feedback about the idea behind this thread please post them here: https://talk.lowendspirit.com/discussion/1900/what-do-you-think-of-this-idea-for-the-forum-open-offer-posts instead of clogging up this thread.
